channel.title: Need help adding custom and donatore system with shops and weps on blank source
channel.description:
guys ive jsut started making a new server on a blank source and need help adding working donator system with shops weapons armour and like where to send money to aswell as adding customs i have a list of customs eg vestas bandos scimmy whip gloves plate legs and all that but the problem is i dont no how to add them so i can see them ingame instead of having nulls and im also having a little trouble with my spawn system because when i do eg ::pickup 16012 1 it says error synatx and i also might need a source so guys please help with detailed guide im new to this so thanks
(~Shanky~)

item.title: Need help adding custom and donatore system with shops and weps on blank source
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

Lol Here I Will Post My More Deeper Tut Of Models XD
Ok If You Was Adding A Death Cape Or Somethin To Your Server You Would Need To Also Add It To Your Client
When You Get The Model(s) For The Item You Add Them Into The Models Folder On Your Client.
Then Once You Have The Ints You Add That Into Class8.java
Once That Is Done You Comiple.
Then Run Your Client And Once Logged Onto Your Server You Need To Say
“Add model (model number)”
Then Restart Your Client
Once Restarted Do :: pickup (item number) And You Should Have It In Your Hand…
But Your Not Done Yet…
Turnoff Your Server And Open Your Server/Source Files
Go Into item.java And If You Had A Cape That You Was Adding To Your Server You Would Get The Item Number And Add It Under “public static int capes”
If You Have A Item4.java File Like I Do Then Do The Same There
Once Done Then Simply Compile
Run Your Server And Client And It Should Be On There Succesfully In The Right Equip Spot
Hope This Helps (Since It Took Me 5 Mins XD)
Oh And If Anyone Thinks I Missed Anything Then Let Me Know

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding custom and donatore system with shops and weps on blank source
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

I Can Help You With The Customs
When You Have The Model Add It To Your Clients Model File.
Get The Ints And Add That Into Class 8.java Well I Think Its .java I Dunno… XD
Once You Have Done That Go Into Your Source Folder And Find Item.java
And If You Were Adding Some Custom Legs You Would Look For public static int legs And Just Add The Item ID Into That Section
Hope This Helps With The Customs :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2009, 03:39:02 pm[/size][hr]And Dont Forget To Compile With BOTH Compilers Once You Have Done All That
Sorry For Double Posting
